snippet: A son of New York says the Stage Deli closed because it didn’t remain true to its deli roots.
lead_paragraph: A son of New York says the Stage Deli closed because it didn’t remain true to its deli roots.

headline.seo: The Stage Deli, a Midtown Landmark, Serves Its Last Pastrami on Rye
headline.main: A Midtown Landmark Serves Its Last Pastrami on Rye
headline.print_headline: A Midtown Landmark Serves Its Last Pastrami on Rye
